extendedInfo.description: Hidden Object game lovers.  Best game for you.Explore different unique scenes and seek different objects. Tap on panel and search the objects given from the list.  Grab it for free. Features:*Compatible on all Android devices with screen resolution  size  320X480, 480X800, 480X854, 1024X600, 1280X720,  1280X800 pixels.* Unique Hidden Object Game to play* Explore unique scene to explore* Unique game at every try.* Resume the game from the last scene.* Handy hint option available.* Highly addictive game play.* Replay scene and beat the best time* Compatible on Google Nexus 7 phone and tablet,Galaxy S2,Galaxy S3 and other similar devicesHow to play:This game constitutes catchy images with objects hidden in between them. The user has to find out only the required objects from the list below.  To unlock the consecutive chapters, the user has to clear the level . You can also make use of the available Hint option to find out the required objects but remember that you can use hint only  once in a minute. Showcasing stimulating themes and fantastic graphics, you will easily get caught up in this detailed and real catchy seek and find game.The app is projected to do well as it does apply to casual gamers across different ages. It should also appeal to young children as the graphics and the objects have been designed keeping them in mind.Try it out and we bet that you wonât get bored as every time you will have to find new objects on the screen within a given limit of time.This application is brought to you totally free with the help of search monetization. I have opted to use this to be able to keep creating more free apps for you. Please note that with this app you will receive a few search points on your device, all are easily deleted or replaced. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Good concept, needs some improvement
reviews.comment: Even on a 7\" tablet, (nexus 7, jellybean) the scene is way too small, really NEEDS a zoom function. Make the ad solid, not blinking. It\'s so annoying I may uninstall.
reviews.author: Coralene Medved

reviews.title: Couldn\'t even open it
reviews.comment: Glaxay s4--loaded it, accepted the terms & went to open the 1st level & the game closed. Such a waste of time...

reviews.title: Stuck Again
reviews.comment: Level 7 won\'t open.  I was enjoying this game and having fun until now.  I hope this is fixed would like to continue.
reviews.author: Rustina Realm

reviews.title: There are some issues
reviews.comment: I love the scenes, those are great. But the rest needs some work. The scene is too small on the screen to find most objects yet there\'s no zoom option. The list of items on the bottom via the slide menu isn\'t the best either...it\'s too small, doesn\'t hide fully & prevents you from tapping some items, so, you fail. & the ad blinking on top; either have it or don\'t, but NOT blinking. The blinking itself is annoying, but when you go to click an object & the ad blinks on, guess what you click...not the item.
reviews.author: Angela R

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: The game is fun but it wont let me go pass level 4, its really frustrating. Fix it pls
